[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/context](./context.md) &gt; [BindingTagFilter](./context.bindingtagfilter.md)

## BindingTagFilter interface

Binding filter function that holds a binding tag pattern. `Context.find()` uses the `bindingTagPattern` to optimize the matching of bindings by tag to avoid expensive check for all bindings.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface BindingTagFilter extends BindingFilter 
```
**Extends:** [BindingFilter](./context.bindingfilter.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [bindingTagPattern](./context.bindingtagfilter.bindingtagpattern.md) |  | [BindingTag](./context.bindingtag.md) \| RegExp | A special property on the filter function to provide access to the binding tag pattern which can be utilized to optimize the matching of bindings by tag in a context. |
